name: SPROUT Content
description:
SPROUT Content is a content marketing agency and certified HubSpot Platinum inbound marketing agency partner, honored as the winner of the 2015 IMPACT Award for Happiest HubSpot Clients. We are passionate about helping businesses in "Unglamorous" industries tell their story through Performance Content that engages, informs, builds relationships and ultimately delivers quality leads and new customers.
 Content is your 24/7 sales team and spokesperson that should be building relationships with your customers and prospects while you're busy running it. We help you set goals, clarify your message and develop an inbound marketing/content marketing strategy that connects with your audience and delivers results that are proven. 
 
We don't believe any industry is "boring" and there is no such thing as B2B or B2C. We focus on developing person-to-person relationships that help you attract new customers and evangelize the ones you have. Our team really gets to know your company to develop a clear content strategy with purposeful content that brings your story to life, sets you apart from the competition, makes a memorable impression with your audience and turns prospects into customers for life.
